mapper.insert: insert into (house h_no, m_id, m_name, m_phone, h_zip, h_address, h_fare, h_startdate, h_enddate, h_info, h_peoplecnt, h_type, h_livetype, h_checktime, h_sale, h_salefare, h_rule, h_thumnail) values (house_seq.nextval, #{m_id}, #{m_name}, #{m_phone}, #{h_zip}, #{h_address}, #{h_fare}, #{h_startdate}, #{h_enddate}, #{h_info}, #{h_peoplecnt}, #{h_type}, #{h_livetype}, #{h_checktime}, #{h_sale}, #{h_salefare}, #{h_rule}, #{h_thumnail})
